title: alpha2019
author: alpha2019
created_time: June 21, 2023, 07:07:35 AMLast edit: June 21, 2023, 10:25:33 AM by alpha2019
content: I am not the dev just the miner of the communityexplorer: http://explorer.lkc.today/github:https://github.com/LKCNetwork/LuckyCoin/releaseswebsite :none until nowTelegram :https://t.me/Luckycoind  unoffical I creat itDiscord :https://discord.gg/37g3vrbnPool : soonblock reward is 37 and about 400 block per day ,it launch appro in June 15th How to mine it :wget https://github.com/LKCNetwork/LuckyCoin/releases/download/v.1.0.0/LuckyCoin-CLI-Ubuntu-20.04.zipunzip LuckyCoin-CLI-Ubuntu-20.04.zipcd LuckyCoin-CLI-Ubuntu-20.04/chmod +x luckycoindchmod +x greenwallet./luckycoind to synced and chain./greenwallet to generate the wallet and  then  back to luckycoind when it synced use start_mining spend_key view_key threads  to start_miningor use ./luckycoind --mining-spend-key spend_key --mining-view-key view_key --mining-threads threads to synced &miningNow I use the vps with 2vcpu and hashrate is 60h/s7402 in HZ is 1050h/s 2640v2 is 180h/s

comments.body: I would be very carefull in this Topic and if you download the files from that Github !
